trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> objects that represent the cells in a single row of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> 의 단일 행의 셀을 나타내는 개체는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the HtmlTableCellCollection class to programmatically manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> objects that represent the cells of a single row in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: HtmlTableCellCollection 클래스를 사용 하 여 프로그래밍 방식으로 컬렉션을 관리 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>에 단일 행의 셀을 나타내는 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: This class is commonly used to add, remove, or modify the contents of a cell in a row of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 추가, 제거 또는 행의 셀의 내용을 수정 하는 데 주로 사용 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A> property that contains a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>컨트롤에 포함 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A>속성의 컬렉션을 포함 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>개체.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> object represents an individual row in the table.
trans-unit.target: 각 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>개체 테이블의 개별 행을 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> object contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Cells%2A> property that represents a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>개체에 포함 되어는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Cells%2A>속성의 컬렉션을 나타내는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>개체.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Cells%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>

trans-unit.source: These objects, in turn, represent the individual cells of a row.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 개체는 행의 개별 셀을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: To retrieve an individual cell, first get the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> object that represents the row containing the cell in the table (from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control).
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀을 검색 하려면 먼저 가져온는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>테이블의 셀을 포함 하는 행을 나타내는 개체입니다 (에서 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A>의 컬렉션은 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>컨트롤).</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>

trans-unit.source: You can then get the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object that represents the cell in the row (from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Cells%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> object).
trans-unit.target: 가져올 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>행의 셀을 나타내는 개체입니다 (에서 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Cells%2A>의 컬렉션은 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>개체).</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Cells%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> object to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 추가 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> 개체의 끝에는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to add the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object to the end of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하 여 지정 된 추가 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>개체의 끝에는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>컬렉션.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: If you want to insert an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object in a specified location in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 삽입 하려는 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>사용 하 여 컬렉션의 지정된 된 위치에서 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection.Insert%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> 컬렉션에 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Removes all <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> objects from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 모든 제거 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> 에서 개체는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove all <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> objects from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection and reset the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection.Count%2A> property to `0`.
trans-unit.target: 모든 제거 하려면이 메서드를 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>에서 개체를 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>컬렉션과 재설정은 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection.Count%2A>속성을 `0`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection.Count%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method removes the cells from a row, but it does not remove the row from the table.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >이 메서드는 행에서 셀을 제거 하지만 테이블에서 행을 제거 하지는 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: To remove a row from the table, be sure to also remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> object that represents the row from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 테이블에서 행을 제거 하려면도 제거 해야는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>에서 행을 나타내는 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A>의 컬렉션은 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>

trans-unit.source: Copies the items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection to the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, beginning with the specified index in the <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 항목 복사는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> 지정 된 컬렉션 <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>의 지정된 된 인덱스부터는 <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection into the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting at the specified index of the array.
trans-unit.target: 내용을 복사 하려면이 메서드를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>여 지정 된 컬렉션 <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>배열의 지정한 인덱스에서 시작 합니다.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `array` parameter must be a zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >는 `array` 매개 변수는&0;부터 시작 <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> 이어야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 0부터 시작 <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> 에서 복사한 항목을 수신 하는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The first index in the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> to receive the items.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 첫 번째 인덱스 <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> 항목을 받도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 개수를 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> 개체에 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the Count property to determine the number of cells contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Count 속성을 사용 하 여에 포함 된 셀의 수를 확인 하 고 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>컬렉션.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>

trans-unit.source: The Count property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound.
trans-unit.target: Count 속성 컬렉션을 반복 하는 경우의 상한을 결정 하려면 일반적으로 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 수가 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> 개체에 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object that contains all <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-구현 모두 포함 하는 개체 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> 개체에 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object that can be iterated through to retrieve the contents of each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 만드는 데는 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-구현에서 각 항목의 콘텐츠를 검색 하 반복할 수 있는 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>컬렉션.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>컬렉션에서 항목을 현재 가져올 속성을 가리키는.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move to the next item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>컬렉션의 다음 항목으로 이동 하는 메서드.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator to the initial position.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>초기 위치에 열거자를 이동 하는 메서드.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method must be called after creating the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object, or after using the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >는 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>만든 후에 메서드를 호출 해야는 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-구현 개체를 사용한 후 또는 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>열거자는 컬렉션의 첫 번째 항목을 이동 하는 메서드.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않은 경우으로 표시 되는 항목의 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성이 정의 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object that contains all <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-구현 모두 포함 하는 개체 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> 개체에 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> object at the specified index location of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 추가 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> 개체의 지정한 인덱스 위치는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the Insert method to add the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object to an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Insert 메서드를 사용 하 여 지정 된 추가 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>컬렉션 내의 지정한 인덱스에.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: If you want to simply append an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object to the end of the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 단순히 추가 하려는 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>개체를 사용 하 여 컬렉션의 끝에서 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection.Add%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: The location in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> at which to add the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 위치는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> 를 추가할는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션은 읽기 전용입니다.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection can be written to in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 항상 반환 `false` 임을 나타내는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>모든 경우에에서 컬렉션에 쓸 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>모든 경우에 대 한

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 액세스 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션이 동기화 되어 스레드로부터 안전 하 게 보호 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> and is overridden to always return `false` to indicate that access to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection is not synchronized (not thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에서 파생 된 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>항상 반환 하도록 재정의 하 고 `false` 대 한 액세스를 나타내기 위해는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>컬렉션 (스레드로부터 안전 하지) 동기화 되지 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the IsSynchronized property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: IsSynchronized 속성에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조는 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>의 속성은 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>인터페이스.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for all cases, which indicates that access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> is not synchronized (not thread safe).
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>모든 경우에 대 한 액세스가 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> (스레드로부터 안전 하지) 동기화 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> object at the specified index from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> 개체에서 지정 된 인덱스는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to get an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 이 인덱서를 사용 하 여 가져오려는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>에서 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>컬렉션.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: You can access an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object at a specified index by using simple array notation.
trans-unit.target: 에 액세스할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>단순 배열 표기법을 사용 하 여 지정된 된 인덱스에는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The collection is zero-based; therefore, the first element in the collection contains an index value of `0`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 따라서 컬렉션의 첫 번째 요소 인덱스 값이 나와 있습니다; 컬렉션은&0;부터 시작 `0`합니다.

trans-unit.source: An ordinal index value that specifies the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> to return.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는 서 수 인덱스 값은 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> 돌아갑니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> that represents a cell contained in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> 에 포함 된 셀을 나타내는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 제거 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> 에서 개체는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하 여 지정 된 제거 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>에서 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>컬렉션.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you specify an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object that does not exist in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection, no item is removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 지정 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>에 존재 하지 않는 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>컬렉션 항목이 컬렉션에서 제거 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> 에서 제거 하 고 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> object at the specified index from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 제거는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> 개체에서 지정 된 인덱스는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object at the specified index from an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하 여 제거 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>개체에서 지정 된 인덱스는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>컬렉션.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: The index number is zero-based; therefore, the first item in the collection has an index value of `0`.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스 번호는&0;부터 시작 합니다. 따라서 컬렉션의 첫 번째 항목에는 인덱스 값 `0`합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you specify an index that is outside the range of index values, an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 인덱스 값의 범위 밖에 있는 인덱스를 지정 하는 경우 예외가 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> 에서 제거 하 고 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The specified index is outside the range of index values in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 인덱스는 컬렉션의 인덱스 값의 범위를 벗어났습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 액세스를 동기화 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 개체를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: The object returned in this implementation is the current instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> 의 현재 인스턴스가이 구현에서 반환 되는 개체

trans-unit.source: For more information on the SyncRoot property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: SyncRoot 속성에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조는 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>의 속성은 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>인터페이스.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 대 한 액세스를 동기화 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 개체입니다.
